attributes.action: Automatic by election for any MP that votes for a second referendum.
attributes.background: If you force us to vote again, we'll vote again on your position.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views and opinions. 

If you would like constituents to be able to recall their MP's for any reason, you may like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
